articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Big vote on Tuesday in Europe could determine the future of the Lightning port on iPhone - PhoneArena
articles.description: By next week, when voting ends on June 7th in Europe, we should know whether Apple will need to replace the Lightning port with USB-C in Europe at least.

articles.author: Gavin Cooney
articles.title: Preview: Ireland out to break one of the worst Nations League records in Europe against Armenia - The42
articles.description: Stephen Kenny has set his side the target of winning their group – tonight Ireland take the first step in making good on his ambition.

articles.title: Notable planetary researcher Lee Yeon-joo selected to lead S. Korea's first Venus research - Aju Business Daily
articles.description: [Courtesy of the Institute for Basic Science]SEOUL -- Lee Yeon-joo, a recognized researcher involved in planetary research projects in Europe and Japan, has been picked to lead South Koreas first project to study the atmosphere of planets in the Solar System.…
